statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerRewards
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM CustomerRewards ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM CustomerRewards GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(loyalty_points) > 100
SELECT * FROM CustomerRewards WHERE loyalty_points >= 50 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, jsonb_array_length(purchased_items) AS num_items FROM CustomerRewards ORDER BY num_items DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerRewards WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT loyalty_points, customer_id FROM CustomerRewards WHERE loyalty_points > 500 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM CustomerRewards GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT customer_id, jsonb_array_length(purchased_items) as num_of_items FROM CustomerRewards WHERE jsonb_array_length(purchased_items) > 2
SELECT customer_id, MAX(loyalty_points) AS max_points FROM CustomerRewards
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, loyalty_points FROM customers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100.00 AND quantity > 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT customer_name,MAX(loyalty_points) AS max_points FROM customers GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY max_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_products > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, join_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT item_name, item_category, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE item_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM customers JOIN loyalty_points ON customers.customer_id = loyalty_points.customer_id WHERE points > 100;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM eco_friendly_items WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY category, item_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM customers ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE total_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE is_eco_friendly = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, total_points FROM customers WHERE total_points >= 500 ORDER BY total_points DESC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE is_eco_friendly = TRUE AND price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, reward_name, point_cost FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE is_expired = FALSE;
